sentinel.led
Class RuleScheduler

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.lang.Thread
        |
        +--sentinel.led.RuleScheduler
public class RuleScheduler
extends java.lang.Thread
implements Scheduler

The RuleScheduler class represents the rule scheduler. It contains an instance of a process rule list. The rule scheduler schedules rules in immRuleQueue if deferredFlag is false, else it schedules the rules in deferredQueueOne. If a particular rule queue is empty, it calls the wait() method and waits. It is woken up again when an event triggers rules, that is done from inside the notifyEvent() method of an event node.
